description: You enter an abandoned part of the Roost. There might be something useful lying here among the straw. What do you do?
name: An abandoned, old chicken coop

description: You enter an abandoned part of the Roost. You wonder if there could be any gold or weapons here. What do you do?
name: An empty part of the Roost

description: You enter the Chicken King's chambers, but it seems the King is not here. You could try snooping around.
name: The Chicken King's chambers

description: You discover a Chicken Blacksmith, selling his wares. The bird eyes you suspiciously...
name: Chicken Blacksmith

description: You suddenly discover a treasure chest, hidden away among the straw.
name: Treasure Chest
